price: Mose, nokorε sε εyε Me, Onyankopͻn Otumfoͻ no a Otumi ade nyinaa yε, Onyansafoͻ no.
arabic: يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yāmūsā innahu anā al-lahu al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
